jd: From: Kiran Bhatt, Largeton INC. kiran.bhatt@largeton.us Reply to: kiran.bhatt@largeton.us Job Short DescriptionWe are seeking an experienced IT Project Manager/Scrum Master with a strong background in Azure services, specifically Azure Data Factory (ADF), AzureJob Description Title- Technical Project ManagerClient- EmidsLocation- Onsite- Louisville, KY Duration- 6+ Months Visa- No H1B/opt/cpt We are seeking an experienced IT Project Manager/Scrum Master with a strong background in Azure services, specifically Azure Data Factory (ADF), Azure Databricks, and Python, to join our team. The ideal candidate will have significant experience in the healthcare data engineering space, managing projects that involve complex data integration and analytics. The successful candidate will be responsible for leading and managing projects, ensuring successful delivery within scope, timeline, and budget, while also facilitating agile practices and methodologies. Must Haves: Azure Background, Exceptional Communication Skills, and healthcare Background. Nice to Haves: AWS/ GCP Background Look for Pharmacy background TPM/EM 1st preference, 2nd preference will be strong healthcare. Look for people who can travel or relocate to Louisville, KY. Or near to location below is the map for reference to find folks. Thanks & RegardsKiran Bhatt|Technical RecruiterEmail:kiran.bhatt@largeton.us LARGETON INC | 13800 Coppermine Rd, Herndon, VA 20171
